request.description:
Provide values to variables: client_id, redirect_url ([Postman environments](https://www.getpostman.com/docs/postman/environments_and_globals/manage_environments) is great for it).

Test this link in a web browser.

You can get the URL by going to "Code" - "cURL".

For details go to [https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#authorize-a-user](https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#authorize-a-user).

For details of authentication process go to [https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#authentication-process](https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#authentication-process).

Provide values to variables: client_id, client_secret ([Postman environments](https://www.getpostman.com/docs/postman/environments_and_globals/manage_environments) is great for it).

Provide value for one-off variable code.

For details go to [https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#create-an-access_token](https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#create-an-access_token).

For details of authentication process go to [https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#authentication-process](https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#authentication-process).

For details go to [https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#refresh-access_token](https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#refresh-access_token).

For details of authentication process go to [https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#authentication-process](https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#authentication-process).

header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Allow
header.description: Valid actions for a specified resource. To be used for a 405 Method not allowed

header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Encoding
header.description: The type of encoding used on the data.

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Expires
header.description: Gives the date/time after which the response is considered stale

header.name: Pragma
header.description: Implementation-specific headers that may have various effects anywhere along the request-response chain.

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

request.description:
Provide value to variable: template_id ([Postman environments](https://www.getpostman.com/docs/postman/environments_and_globals/manage_environments) is great for it).

For details and the sample template go to [https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#create-document-from-pandadoc-template](https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#create-document-from-pandadoc-template).

For details of document creation in general go to [https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#new-document](https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#new-document).

For details and the sample PDF go to [https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#section-pdf-form-fields](https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#section-pdf-form-fields).

For details about document creation from PDF go to [https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#create-document-from-pdf](https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#create-document-from-pdf).

For details of document creation in general go to [https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#new-document](https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#new-document).

For details and the sample PDF go to [https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#section-pdf-field-tags](https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#section-pdf-field-tags).

For details about document creation from PDF go to [https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#create-document-from-pdf](https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#create-document-from-pdf).

For details of document creation in general go to [https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#new-document](https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#new-document).

For details go to [https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#link-to-a-document](https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#link-to-a-document).

For details of document sharing go to [https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#share-document](https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#share-document).

Test this link in a web browser.

You can get the URL by going to "Code" - "cURL".

For details go to [https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#link-to-a-document](https://developers.pandadoc.com/v1/reference#link-to-a-document).
